bug.summary: Polygon editing behaviour can be unexpected
bug.description:
I am talking about the following feature: <denchmark-link:https://youtu.be/XTwfXDh4clI?t=138>https://youtu.be/XTwfXDh4clI?t=138</denchmark-link>
When using the new ui the previous selection dissapears when reconnecting the point. The old ui works perfectly fine. environment: I followed the installation instructions a few days ago so to update i did git pull docker-compose build everything did re-install again, so i am fairly confident i am on today's version.
